sources.title: Let's Get Movin' (1936)
sources.description: Olive is moving out of her apartment; she's hired Bluto to move her things, but Popeye comes over to visit and won't be shown up. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/lets-get-movin-1936/

metadata.Plot: Olive is moving out of her apartment; she's hired Bluto to move her, but Popeye comes over to visit and won't be shown up - at least, not after he's had his spinach. But would you really want these two handling your belongings?
metadata.Actors: Jack Mercer, Mae Questel, Gus Wicke
